headline: No, Josh Mandel did not edit his face onto a Black Marine in his new U.S. Senate ad
author: Haley BeMiller
sentences: "Josh: Regretfully, I do not believe that I or @TheKingCenter legitimately motivated you to film this ad, as it is in opposition to nonviolence and to much of what my father taught," King tweeted on Tuesday.

Haley BeMiller is a reporter for the USA TODAY Network Ohio Bureau, which serves the Columbus Dispatch, Cincinnati Enquirer, Akron Beacon Journal and 18 other affiliated news organizations across Ohio.
U.S. Senate candidate Josh Mandel drew swift condemnation this week after he filmed a campaign ad attacking critical race theory against the backdrop of a civil rights landmark in Selma, Alabama.
